Package org.restlet.engine.http

Supports HTTP connectors.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Call Low-level call for the HTTP connectors.
ClientCall Low-level HTTP client call.
HttpClientHelper Base HTTP client connector.
HttpProtocolHelper Protocol helper for the HTTP protocol.
HttpRequest Request wrapper for server HTTP calls.
HttpResponse Response wrapper for server HTTP calls.
HttpServerHelper Base HTTP server connector.
ServerCall Abstract HTTP server connector call.
WebDavProtocolHelper Protocol helper for the WEBDAV protocol.
 

Package org.restlet.engine.http Description

Supports HTTP connectors.

Since:
Restlet 2.0
